title: Create Payment Management UI Components
description: Develop UI components for payment management including payment processing, history, status tracking, and saved payment method management.

user_stories: As a customer, I want to pay securely for services so that I can complete bookings
As a service provider, I need to track payment status so that I can manage my earnings
As a user, I want to view payment history so that I can track my transactions
business_rules: Payment components must handle secure payment information
Payment history must display transaction details clearly
Payment status tracking must be accurate and real-time
Payment components must follow the design system
edge_cases: Handling payment processing with various payment methods
Managing payment status updates and notifications
Displaying payment errors and retry options

acceptance_criteria: Payment processing form handles secure payment submission
Payment history component displays transactions with filtering
Payment status tracking displays current payment status
Payment components follow the design system
Payment components handle error states properly

endpoints.description: Get all payments with optional filtering
Process a refund for a payment

e2e_tests: Complete payment workflow from booking to payment
Payment processing with different payment methods

additional_context.technical_notes: Follow Angular best practices for component development. Implement proper form handling and validation. Ensure secure handling of payment information.
additional_context.security_considerations: Ensure PCI compliance for payment information handling. Implement proper authorization checks for payment management actions. Validate all user inputs to prevent injection attacks.

subtasks.title: Create Payment Method Management Component
subtasks.description: Develop UI component for managing saved payment methods (listing, adding, deleting, setting default) for customer and tenant admin profiles.

blocking_information.can_start_date: After FE-002, FE-005-01, and BE-XXX-03 completion

endpoints.description: List saved payment methods for a user/tenant.
Set a payment method as default.

acceptance_criteria: Component displays a list of saved payment methods.
Allows adding new payment methods securely.
Provides options to delete and set default payment methods.
Integrates with backend API for payment method management.
Component follows design system and is responsive.

additional_context.technical_notes: Implement using Angular Reactive Forms. Integrate with payment gateway for secure tokenization of card details. Ensure proper display of masked card numbers. Handle error states and success messages.
additional_context.security_considerations: Ensure PCI compliance for handling payment information. Use tokenization to avoid storing sensitive card data directly. Implement proper authorization checks for managing payment methods.
